title: The Priests Begin Their Ministry
summary: Leviticus 9 shows Aaron and his sons beginning their priestly duties. They offer sacrifices for themselves and the people, and God confirms their ministry by sending fire to consume the offering on the altar.

faq.question: What did God do to show His approval?
faq.answer: He sent fire from heaven to consume the offering, and the people shouted and fell facedown.

faq.question: What types of offerings were made?
faq.answer: Sin offerings, burnt offerings, fellowship offerings, and grain offerings.
